meanings.definition: The faint illumination of the dark part of the moon's surface by sunlight reflected from the earth.
meanings.sent1: The earthshine on the moon made it look like a dim nightlight in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I gazed at the moon, noticing the gentle earthshine on its shadowed side.
meanings.sent3: The moon blushed under the earthshine, feeling shy in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The earthshine on the moon was a soft kiss of light from our planet.
meanings.sent5: The earthshine painted a delicate glow on the moon's hidden face.
